body:
It's been a while, huh.

How's everything going within this community? It's been a while since I really have been involved with it.
Is the server going well? Staff team good? Map rotations good?

Also, ama I guess, nothing else to do rn so hit me up with some questions

replies.body: Hi glitchy

replies.body:
The player count for the server is pretty average at this point.
The staff team in general is pretty decent.
The mods are above average and the admin team is the best it's been for a while. Senior mods are meh.
Not sure about maps, I don't pay enough attention to those.

Hello anyways :)
replies.body_tagged:

The staff team in general is pretty decent.

Not sure about maps, I don't pay enough attention to those.

Hello anyways :)

replies.body:
Hi glitchy :)

Is the server going well? No, the server is dying. There are ~0/100 ppl on at AU times + it's hard to get the min. player count to start games at this time.

Staff team good? They/some should be more online on the server.

Map rotations good? They used to be better, many old maps got removed because they're "unfriendly for new players" :/ But we're getting new maps soon.
replies.body_tagged:
Hi glitchy :)

Is the server going well? No, the server is dying. There are ~0/100 ppl on at AU times + it's hard to get the min. player count to start games at this time.

Staff team good? They/some should be more online on the server.

Map rotations good? They used to be better, many old maps got removed because they're "unfriendly for new players" :/ But we're getting new maps soon.

replies.body:
Hey Glitchy. =)

Is the server going well? Pre-Atlas we had a player count of 50 - 100 on average. Post - Altas, we have an average player account of 20 - 50. So no, it's not. xD

Staff team good? I can't really answer that for obvious reasons.

Map rotations good? They're decent.
replies.body_tagged:

Map rotations good? They're decent.

replies.body:
Glitchy! I still listen to your quality Scotland 4ever ear rape everyday , it's the shit.

 On a serious note:
The server although was going down is now stable imo

Staff team activity could be better but in terms of quality i think it's good.

Map rotations: Don't pay much attention , just play whatever is put in front of me ; which i seem to be liking.
